item.title: By: Sarah Cosper
item.dc:creator: Sarah Cosper
item.description:
In reply to <a href="/shower-scene/#comment-440">Suzi</a>.
You brush your teeth in the shower?!? I love brushing my teeth in the shower! I shave my legs while I'm waiting on conditioner too.
item.content:encoded:
In reply to Suzi.

You brush your teeth in the shower?!? I love brushing my teeth in the shower! I shave my legs while I’m waiting on conditioner too.

item.title: By: Suzi
item.dc:creator: Suzi
item.description: I'm with you lady! I can't believe anyone would do it any other way. I'm a shower multitasker, but I resist the urge to wash my face as my conditioner soaks in by brushing my teeth instead. Kind of gross? Maybe. But it's damn effective. ;)
item.content:encoded: I’m with you lady! I can’t believe anyone would do it any other way. I’m a shower multitasker, but I resist the urge to wash my face as my conditioner soaks in by brushing my teeth instead. Kind of gross? Maybe. But it’s damn effective. ðŸ˜‰
